sentences.sentence: The premiere on Monday is sold out.
sentences.translation: 周一的首映票已经售完。

sentences.sentence: The world premiere took place in August 1956.
The performance will include the premiere of three new ballets.
sentences.translation: 这次演出将包括3部新芭蕾舞剧的首演。
